hackathon-description-text: The winning team, Garden Sharing, came up with a solution around three key themes: Green cities, collaboration and ecology. They wanted to connect people who have a garden to share and those who’d like use of one, and also create new ways to grow food and collectively care for plants. On why the team chose their idea, they said, “We really care about the future.”
